pr_title: HDDS-4299. Display Ratis version with ozone version

timeline.message: HDDS-4299. Display Ratis version with ozone version

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
LoggerFactory.getLogger(getClass()).warn("Could not read '" +
RATIS_VERSION_PROPERTIES, ex);
LoggerFactory.getLogger(getClass()).warn("Could not read " +
RATIS_VERSION_PROPERTIES, ex);
timeline.author: adoroszlai
